title: The City of Your Final Destination (Full Movie) Drama, Anthony Hopkins, Laura Linney

sources.title: The City of Your Final Destination (Full Movie) Drama, Anthony Hopkins, Laura Linney
sources.description:
Twenty-eight-year-old Kansas University doctoral student Omar Razaghi (Omar Metwally) wins a grant to write a biography of Latin American writer Jules Gund. Omar must get through to three people who were close to Gund; his brother, widow, and younger mistress, so he can get authorization to write the biography.

Director: James Ivory
Writers: Ruth Prawer Jhabvala (screenplay), Peter Cameron (novel)
Stars: Laura Linney, Omar Metwally, Anthony Hopkins, Charlotte Gainsbourg
2009
